content: This team won’t make the finals. They are old and their defense is basically non-existent aside from flashes at the end of the game as Haley referenced. How do they even get out of the East? Historically, we may look back on LeBron’s Cleveland tenure in admiration because most of his teams are less than a sum of their parts. Even last year, they were down 3–1 and basically a Green suspension away from losing that Finals.
